entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Vegreville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:24 AM MDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
